member.name: CERT_PAIR
member.summary: The CERT_PAIR structure contains a certificate and its pair cross certificate.

member.name: CERT_PAIR.Forward
member.summary: An optional CERT_BLOB structure that contains a certificate. If the cbData member of Forward is zero, the certificate may be empty.

member.name: CERT_PAIR.Reverse
member.summary: An optional CERT_BLOB structure that contains a certificate. If the cbData member of Reverse is zero, the certificate may be empty.
